doc:
Kevin Cheng https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kevin_Cheng 0 Kevin Cheng Ka-wing (born 15 August 1969) is a Hong Kong American actor and singer who is currently under the management of the Hong Kong television network TVB. Cheng rose to fame in late 2004 after playing his first lead role in the TVB drama Hard Fate. He is best known for his role as "L.A. Law" in the 2011 TVB legal drama Ghetto Justice, which earned him a TVB Anniversary Award for Best Actor and Asian Television Award for Best Actor in a Leading Role. Kevin_Cheng_Ka-wing ( born 15_August_1969 ) is a_Hong_Kong_American_actor_and_singer who is currently under the_management of the_Hong_Kong_television_network_TVB . Cheng rose to fame in late_2004 after playing his_first_lead_role in the_TVB_drama_Hard_Fate . He is_best_known for his_role as "_L.A._Law " in the_2011_TVB_legal_drama_Ghetto_Justice , which earned him a_TVB_Anniversary_Award for Best_Actor_and_Asian_Television_Award for Best_Actor in a_Leading_Role .
